name: Medical Grants Pervushina & Partners
goal:
Using pooled data from top grants databases we support organizations, companies and individual healthcare professionals in selecting of the appropriate public, industrial and philantropic funding as well as public-private-partnerships for biomedical research, development and education.
We are committed to:

- identifying and monitoring of international funding opportunities to meet health and life sciences professionals' needs
- endorsing the highest standards in healthcare and biomedical research
-promoting lifelong learning and international cooperation

We help to make innovations development in the health and life sciences faster and more efficient.
interests: Education and training, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Medical Grants Pervushina & Partners is involved into European Innovation Partnership on Active and Healthy Ageing and actively collaborates with EURAXESS database.
customers: EURAXESS,The European Academy of Neurology (EAN),EUROPEAN INNOVATION PARTNERSHIP
